pages.text:
[Page Title: Reservations — Lost Isle]

0 Welcome to Lost Isle. 
Nestled on Johns Island, we’re the island’s first fire-to-table restaurant and bar, located at 3338 Maybank Highway beside The Tattooed Moose!

Our entire dining experience unfolds outdoors, tucked behind the building beneath a sprawling pecan tree and an open sky.

Settle in by the glow of the fire, cozy up under the heaters, or wrap yourself in a warm blanket as the night settles in.

Slow down, linger a little longer, and let the evening do the rest.

We hope you find your vibe at Lost Isle!
FAQ’s 
| We do have Handicap Accessible Parking & Seating

| Rainy Day Policy - We Open Rain or Shine, but will announce on social media if weather hinders our operations

| We do not take reservations - Come during the week to avoid wait times!

| Dog Policy - We allow happy, healthy, well-behaved dogs who are on a leash and go potty before arrival

| We do not have High Chairs or a Children’s Menu, but we cater to guests of all ages

[Page Title: Lost Isle | Discover, Dine, and Enjoy Now]

0 
Charleston’s First Fire To Table Restaurant & Bar
Eat Drink Visit Located on beautiful Johns Island, just minutes from downtown Charleston & Kiawah Island. 
Lost Isle is a fire-to-table restaurant inspired by the natural beauty and easygoing spirit of Johns Island. Inspired by Lowcountry flavors and thoughtful hospitality, we’re a place to gather, unwind, and enjoy great food in good company. Consider it a little escape—without ever leaving the island.
Please note we are a walk-in only restaurant and we do not accept reservations.
